title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. IV, pt. 114 - Report Of Property Deemed Abandoned
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. IV, pt. 114 - Report Of Property Deemed Abandoned

State Regulations
§ 114.1 - Report of abandoned property
§ 114.2 - Property which shall have ceased to be abandoned
§ 114.3 - Reimbursement for claims paid by insurers or their agents or agencies

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. IV, pt. 114

Statutory authority: Abandoned Property Law, §1316

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
